purpose: Facilitates the creation and orchestration of AI agents using a modular and scalable framework
principle: Built on Python, leveraging modular architecture to enable customization and integration of multiple AI agents
reusability: Offers a plug-and-play architecture with APIs for easy integration and extension of agent functionalities
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and stability issues; primarily suited for experimental use
name: ZerePy
description: ZerePy an open-source framework for AI agents written in Python
highlight: Flexible and extensible framework for building AI agents with a focus on multi-agent systems
